title: Oksana Sans Narrow & Condensed
content:
dear Typophiles!

I am happy to tell about new release.  
It is Oksana Sans Narrow and Condensed, new faces in Oksana big family in six weights each, with european latin & cyrillic codepages.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150303050334im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ok_narrow_cond_01_6533.png)

In this faces i try to experiment with cyrillic ligatures: after very usual ukrainian «ії» and «її» i add also «сл», «єл», «ељ» etc. I plan to expand list of cyrillic ligatures in my fonts and interesting to know your opinion about.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150303050334im_/http:/typophile.com/files/narrow_cond00_4324.png)

Oksana Sans Narrow:  
 [http://http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/oksana-sans-narrow/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150303050334/http:/http/new.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/oksana-sans-narrow/ "http://http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/oksana-sans-narrow/")

Oksana Sans Condensed:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/oksana-sans-condensed/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150303050334/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/oksana-sans-condensed/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/oksana-sans-condensed/")

and few pictures here:  
 [http://type.org.ua/oksana-sans-narrow-cond/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150303050334/http:/type.org.ua/oksana-sans-narrow-cond/ "http://type.org.ua/oksana-sans-narrow-cond/")
author: andrijtype
